trans-unit.source: Downloads the contents of a blob to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Downloads the contents of a blob to a byte array.

trans-unit.source: The starting offset in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: The starting offset in the byte array.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the blob.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the blob.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
